[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00000000_00100000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   000_00000001_00000000
    FLOAT 00110101_10000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   001_10101100_00000000
    TFP   000_00000001_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00000000_00100000_00000000_00000000
    TFP   001_10101100_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00110101_10000000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    000_00000001_00000000 + 001_10101100_00000000 = 001_10101100_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    000_00000001_00000000 * 001_10101100_00000000 = 000_00000000_00000000
